show_type.label: Show type (Show Category description or show static blocks with Identifier for url key category in dropdown):

nav_urlkey.label: URL Key Category Show Dropdown Menu:
nav_urlkey.comment: Which url key you want they show dropdrow (Once per line)

static_identifier.label: Static block identifiers:
static_identifier.comment: Which static block you want they show on menu (Once per line)

page_id.label: CMS Page id:
page_id.comment: Which cms page you want they show on menu (Once per line)

catalog_grid_2col.label: Number of columns in grid mode ( 2 columns layout ) :
catalog_grid_2col.comment:
To change number of products per page go to
System -> Configuration -> Catalog -> Frontend

product_img_width.comment: This parameter is used for responsive

logo_path.label: URL Path Logo:
logo_path.comment: Which URL Path Logo key you want they show scroll (Once per line)

static_header_cols_1.label: Header Static 1 Cols:
static_header_cols_1.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Static Main Bottom must be equal 12

static_header_cols_2.label: Header Static 2 Cols:
static_header_cols_2.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Static Main Bottom must be equal 12

static_slideshow_1_cols.label: Slide Show Static 1 Cols:
static_slideshow_1_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Static Main Bottom must be equal 12

static_slideshow_2_cols.label: Slide Show Static 2 Cols:
static_slideshow_2_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Static Main Bottom must be equal 12

top_static_footer_1_cols.label: Top Footer Static 1 cols:

top_static_footer_2_cols.label: Top Footer Static 2 cols:
top_static_footer_2_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Top Footer Static must be equal 12

top_static_footer_3_cols.label: Top Footer Static 3 cols:

top_static_footer_4_cols.label: Top Footer Static 4 cols:
top_static_footer_4_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Top Footer Static must be equal 12

bottom_static_footer_1_cols.label: Bottom Footer Static 1 cols:
bottom_static_footer_1_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Footer Static must be equal 12

bottom_static_footer_2_cols.label: Bottom Footer Static 2 cols:
bottom_static_footer_2_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Footer Static must be equal 12

twitter_replace.comment: Enter stactic block Identifier if you want to replace twitter block with your static block

facebook_replace.label: Replace Facebook with Static block
